name: format
architecture: What neural architecture to use. For the currently implemented ones @see DefaultMuZero

args.num_selfplay_iterations: (int) Number of iterations to repeat the training loop (self play - training - pitting)
args.num_episodes: (int) Number of episodes to perform self play for collecting training examples
args.num_gradient_steps: (int) Number of weight updates to perform in the backpropagation step
args.pitting: (bool) Whether to test the newly trained model against the old model in a trial
args.pitting_trials: (int > 1) Number of trials to test the new model against the old
args.pit_acceptance_ratio: (double: [0, 1]) Win/loss ratio for whether to accept the new model over the old model
args.dirichlet_alpha: (double) Alpha parameter of the dirichlet distribution to sample noise from for exploration
args.exploration_fraction: (double: [0, 1]) Fraction to sample based on noise of the dirichlet for exploration vs the network prior
args.max_buffer_size: (int) Maximum number of game examples to train the neural networks on
args.num_MCTS_sims: (int) Number of planning moves for MCTS to simulate
args.prioritize: (bool) Set to true when using prioritized sampling from the replay buffer (used in Atari)
args.prioritize_alpha: (double) Exponentiation factor for computing probabilities in prioritized replay
args.prioritize_beta: (double) Exponentiation factor for exponentiating the importance sampling ratio in prioritized replay
args.latent_decoder: (bool) MuZero option argument to jointly train a latent-state to real-state decoder model
args.K: (int > 0) Number of 'hypothetical' steps to unroll the MuZero network for during backpropagation
args.n_steps: (int > 0) Amount of steps to look ahead for rewards before bootstrapping (value function estimation)
args.c1: (double) First exploration constant for MuZero in the PUCT formula
args.c2: (double) Second exploration constant for MuZero in the PUCT formula
args.gamma: (double: [0, 1]) MDP Discounting factor for future rewards
args.minimum_reward: (double) Lower bound on the cumulative reward of the environment (null if not known)
args.maximum_reward: (double) Upper bound on the cumulative reward of the environment (null if not known)
args.checkpoint: (path: string) Directory to store sampled experiences and fitted parameters in
args.load_model: (bool) Whether to load in a previously trained model from the checkpoint directory
args.load_folder_file: (Array, ['directory', 'file']) Specify which model to load in
args.selfplay_buffer_window: (int) Maximum number of self play iterations kept in the deque

temperature_schedule.by_weight_update: (bool) Whether to adjust the temperature according to weight updates OR episode steps
temperature_schedule.schedule_points: [[step, value], [step, value]]: Array to govern the temperature schedule

optimizer.method: (string) Optimizer to use for model. MuZero has support for 'sgd' and 'adam'
optimizer.lr_init: (double) Learning rate for the neural network's optimizer (initial learning rate if schedule is used)
optimizer.momentum: (double) Momentum used for optimizer when using SGD.

net_args.l2: (double) Penalty scalar for l2 loss of network weights
net_args.dynamics_penalty: (double) Penalty for MuZero dynamics model for diverging too far from the representation network/ true transition function
net_args.dropout: (double) DropOut regularization rate for the neural network
net_args.cuda: (bool) Whether to make use of GPU accelerated computation (NVIDIA only)
net_args.num_channels: (int) Number of feature maps in the convolutional network
net_args.num_towers: (int) Number of convolutional towers to place in each network
net_args.num_dense: (int) Number of fully connected layers to use as the head of the CNN
net_args.size_dense: (int) Number of hidden nodes to use in the fully connected layers
net_args.support_size: (int) Number of integers for the reward distribution (defaults to a Gaussian if set to 0)
net_args.observation_length: (int) Number of observations in the history to be passed into the encoder
